thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: SallyAZ
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by SallyAZ

author: SallyAZ
title: SallyAZ
text: I know puzzles! I do about a 1000 pc. puzzle a week. And I've sampled every puzzle company out there. I love White Mountain the best. The pieces are the perfect size and the subject matter is always enjoyable. Their customer service is top-notch. I recommend White Mountain to everyone.
